author: kilasuit
body: The install-powershll-readme.md doesnt show any powershell specific instructions even though there is a PowerShell script available in this folder.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:
:tada:This issue was addressed in #10914, which has now been successfully released as `v7.0.0-preview.6`.:tada:

Handy links:
* [Release Notes](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/tag/v7.0.0-preview.6)

title: install-powershell-readme.md doesn't contain any instructions to install from PowerShell
